thread.title: Anthony Martial rescues draw for Manchester United - Swindon Advertiser
thread.title_full: Anthony Martial rescues draw for Manchester United - Swindon Advertiser - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Swindon Advertiser
title: Anthony Martial rescues draw for Manchester United - Swindon Advertiser
text:
United initially froze on a sub-zero night in the Russian capital, gifting CSKA Moscow a penalty when Martial handled in the box. Seydou Doumbia converted the follow up after David de Gea had tipped Roman Eremenko's spot-kick on to the post, but Martial ensured the match ended in a 1-1 draw with a second-half header.
 Swindon Advertiser.
